body_html: OK so after all this, is there any documentation on how one would train a network in python, then consume it (as in run the trained model to classify something) from C++? From what I understand, I would save the graph to file, then add tensorflow.dll as a dependency in my application and load the graph using the c_api.h ? Is that right?

body: OK so after all this, is there any documentation on how one would train a network in python, then consume it (as in run the trained model to classify something) from C++?  From what I understand, I would save the graph to file, then add tensorflow.dll as a dependency in my application and load the graph using the c_api.h ? Is that right?
